document.topic_text: INDEX Faking Identities i A police officer with an original legitimate Identity Card (KTP) on the left and a fake card on the right in Surabaya, East Java, on Sunday (21/08). Surabaya police arrested two suspects, a 35-year-old identified as A.W. and 42-year-old N.S., who allegedly manufactured the cards for vehicle registration renewals and extending motor vehicle tax. (Antara Photo/Didik Suhartono) By : Jakarta Globe | on 2:23 PM August 22, 2016 Category : Multimedia , Photos , Standalone A police officer with an original legitimate Identity Card (KTP) on the left and a fake card on the right in Surabaya, East Java, on Sunday (21/08). Surabaya police arrested two suspects, a 35-year-old identified as A.W. and 42-year-old N.S., who allegedly manufactured the cards for vehicle registration renewals and extending motor vehicle tax. (Antara Photo/Didik Suhartono)
